changeSet.sql: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@it varchar(MAX), @fr varchar(MAX), @de varchar(MAX)) RETURNS varchar(MAX) AS BEGIN DECLARE @singleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'{"langIso":"{{langIso}}","content":"{{content}}"}' DECLARE @multipleLanguageTemplate varchar(MAX)= N'[]' DECLARE @it_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'it'), '$.content', @it) DECLARE @fr_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'fr'), '$.content', @fr) DECLARE @de_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@singleLanguageTemplate, '$.langIso', 'de'), '$.content', @de) DECLARE @result_json varchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@multipleLanguageTemplate, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@it_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@fr_json)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@de_json)) RETURN @result_json END

DECLARE @arrayJsonTemplate nvarchar(MAX) = N'[]' DECLARE @sameDay varchar(MAX) = 'SAME_DAY' DECLARE @nextDay varchar(MAX) = 'NEXT_DAY' DECLARE @partial varchar(MAX) = 'PARTIALLY_AVAILABLE' DECLARE @notAvailable varchar(MAX) = 'NOT_AVAILABLE'
DECLARE @panelTitleSameDay varchar(MAX) = 'Available same day' DECLARE @panelTitleNextDay varchar(MAX) = 'Available next day' DECLARE @panelTitlePartialAvailability varchar(MAX) = 'Partially available' DECLARE @panelTitleNotAvailability varchar(MAX) = 'Not available'
DECLARE @descriptionSameDay varchar(MAX) = 'If delivery type pickup, and an article is immediately available at the local branch, then the term "Immediate" is displayed, regardless of whether a display text has been entered or not.'
DECLARE @colorSameDay varchar(MAX) = '#02ad02' DECLARE @colorNextDay varchar(MAX) = '#707070' DECLARE @colorPartial varchar(MAX) = '#00b4f0' DECLARE @colorNotAvailable varchar(MAX) = '#ffb74c'
DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_it varchar(MAX) = 'Oggi' DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_de varchar(MAX) = 'Heute' DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_fr varchar(MAX) = 'Aujourd''hu'
DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_it varchar(MAX) = 'Prossimo giorno lavorativo' DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_de varchar(MAX) = 'Nächster Arbeitstag' DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_fr varchar(MAX) = 'Prochain jour ouvrable'
DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_it varchar(MAX) = 'Quantità parziale disponibile' DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_de varchar(MAX) = 'Teilmenge verfügbar' DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_fr varchar(MAX) = 'Quantité partielle disponible'
DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_it varchar(MAX) = 'Non disponibile' DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_de varchar(MAX) = 'Nicht verfügbar' DECLARE @listAvailText_notavail_fr varchar(MAX) = 'Non disponible'
DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_it varchar(MAX) = 'Se l''articolo non è disponibile entro 24 ore, sarete informati.' DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_de varchar(MAX) = 'Sollte der Artikel nicht innerhalb von 24 Std lieferbar sein, werden Sie informiert.' DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavail_fr varchar(MAX) = 'Si l''article n''est pas disponible en 24 heures, vous en serez informé.'
DECLARE @defaultDisplayOption varchar(MAX) = 'NONE' DECLARE @notAvailDisplayOption varchar(MAX) = 'DOT'
DECLARE @collectionIdTable TABLE(id int) INSERT INTO @collectionIdTable SELECT ID FROM ORGANISATION_COLLECTION oc WHERE oc.SHORTNAME <> 'sag'
DECLARE @collectionId int DECLARE CollectionCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT ID from @collectionIdTable OPEN collectionCursor FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_fr') BEGIN SET @detailAvailText_notavail_fr = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_fr') END IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_it') BEGIN SET @detailAvailText_notavail_it = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_it') END IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_de') BEGIN SET @detailAvailText_notavail_de = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='detail_avail_text_de') END
IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_fr') BEGIN SET @listAvailText_notavail_fr = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_fr') END IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_it') BEGIN SET @listAvailText_notavail_it = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_it') END IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_de') BEGIN SET @listAvailText_notavail_de = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='list_avail_text_de') END
DECLARE @existingDropShipmentEnable varchar(10) = 'false' DECLARE @existingAvailIconEnable varchar(10) = 'false'
IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='drop_shipment_availability') BEGIN SET @existingDropShipmentEnable = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='drop_shipment_availability') END IF EXISTS (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='availability_icon') BEGIN SET @existingAvailIconEnable = (SELECT ocs.SETTING_VALUE FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND ocs.SETTING_KEY ='availability_icon') END
IF @existingDropShipmentEnable = 'false' IF @existingAvailIconEnable ='false' SET @notAvailDisplayOption = 'DISPLAY_TEXT' ELSE SET @notAvailDisplayOption = 'DOT' ELSE SET @notAvailDisplayOption = 'DROP_SHIPMENT'
DECLARE @listAvailText_sameday_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_it, @listAvailText_sameday_fr,@listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_nextday_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_it, @listAvailText_sameday_fr,@listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_partial_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_sameday_it, @listAvailText_sameday_fr,@listAvailText_sameday_de) DECLARE @listAvailText_notavailable_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@listAvailText_notavail_it, @listAvailText_notavail_fr,@listAvailText_notavail_de)
DECLARE @detailAvailText_notavailable_json varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson(@detailAvailText_notavail_it, @detailAvailText_notavail_fr, @detailAvailText_notavail_de)
DECLARE @samedayJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@sameDay, NULL, @listAvailText_sameday_json, @panelTitleSameDay, @descriptionSameDay, @colorSameDay, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @nextdayJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@nextDay, NULL, @listAvailText_nextday_json, @panelTitleNextDay, NULL, @colorNextDay, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @partiallyJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@partial, NULL, @listAvailText_partial_json, @panelTitlePartialAvailability, NULL, @colorPartial, @defaultDisplayOption) DECLARE @notAvailableJson varchar(MAX) = dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson(@notAvailable, @detailAvailText_notavailable_json, @listAvailText_notavailable_json, @panelTitleNotAvailability, NULL, @colorNotAvailable, @notAvailDisplayOption)
DECLARE @resultJson nvarchar(MAX) = JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(JSON_MODIFY(@arrayJsonTemplate, 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@samedayJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@nextdayJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@partiallyJson)), 'append $', JSON_QUERY(@notAvailableJson))
DELETE dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS WHERE COLLECTION_ID = @collectionId AND SETTING_KEY = 'availability_display' INSERT INTO dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS (COLLECTION_ID, SETTING_KEY, SETTING_VALUE) VALUES(@collectionId, N'availability_display', @resultJson) FETCH NEXT FROM CollectionCursor INTO @collectionId END CLOSE CollectionCursor DEALLOCATE CollectionCursor
DROP FUNCTION dbo.generateSingleAvailTypeJson DROP FUNCTION dbo.generateMultiLanguageJson
